title: We (Finally) Restocked Our Nalgene Bottles
content:
After responding to all your emails about when weâ€™re restocking our Shred Lightly Nalgene bottles, we finally received our shipment today and updated our webshop stock. Thanks for your patience and as always, we greatly appreciate your support!

We still have more products on the way, including more hats, so stay tuned!
author: prolly
